name: Youtube RetroWave
description: Note: Use the dark theme in your Appearance settings More of my Styles? Click Here!
additional_info:
Update changes:
12/9/20
added videos per row in custom settings.
you can now edit how many videos you want to show in a row.

11/20/20
search suggestion/prediction background
added size option for the main background image


11/16/20
animated searchbox when input


11/11/20
Added more options in Custom Settings
including Logo Changer


11/10/20
Added Custom Settings :)
Watched bar animation changed


11/05/20
loading spinner
dropdowns and context bg color
thumbnail animation


11/03/20
background image changed
transition animations
removed snowy animation on topbar
loading circle
miniplayer playlist bg
changing animation when you click a video
other dropdowns and context bg color


11/02/20
changing animation when you click a video
other dropdowns and context bg color


11/01/20
icon colors
background shade
top loading bar
new progress indicator animation

discussions.name: i like how i can change background and logo
